009
010package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
011
012import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
013import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.GaussianFilterSeparable;
014import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.LinearFilter;
015import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack;
016import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
017import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
018import imagingbook.common.math.eigen.Eigensolver2x2;
019
020/**
021 * This class implements the Anisotropic Diffusion filter proposed by David Tschumperle 
022 * in D. Tschumperle and R. Deriche, "Diffusion PDEs on vector-valued images", 
023 * IEEE Signal Processing Magazine, vol. 19, no. 5, pp. 16-25 (Sep. 2002). It is based 
024 * on an earlier C++ (CImg) implementation (pde_TschumperleDeriche2d.cpp) by the original
025 * author, made available under the CeCILL v2.0 license 
026 * (http://www.cecill.info/licences/Licence_CeCILL_V2-en.html).
027 * 
028 * This class is based on the ImageJ API and intended to be used in ImageJ plugins.
029 * How to use: consult the source code of the related ImageJ plugins for examples.
030 * 
031 * @version 2021/01/06 (complete rewrite from scratch)
032 */
033
034public class TschumperleDericheFilter extends GenericFilter implements TschumperleDericheF {
035
036        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
037        
038        private final Parameters params;
039        private int M;                          // image width
040        private int N;                          // image height
041        private int K;                          // number of color channels (any, but typ. 1 or 3)
042        
043        // temporary data
044        private PixelPack Dx, Dy;
045        private PixelPack G;            // structure matrix as (u,v) with 3 elements
046        
047        private GenericFilter filterDx, filterDy;
048        private GenericFilter gradientBlurFilter;
049        private GenericFilter structureBlurFilter;
050        
051        private int T;          // number of iterations
052        private float alpha;
053        private double a0, a1;
054        private PixelPack source, target;
055        
056        
057        public TschumperleDericheFilter() {
058                this(new Parameters());
059        }
060        
061        public TschumperleDericheFilter(Parameters params) {
062                this.params = params;
063        }
064        
065        @Override
066        protected void initFilter(PixelPack source, PixelPack target) { // called by {@link GenericFilter}
067                this.source = source;
068                this.target = target;
069                
070                this.M = source.getWidth(); 
071                this.N = source.getHeight(); 
072                this.K = source.getDepth();
073                
074                this.T = params.iterations;
075                this.alpha = params.alpha0;
076                this.a0 = params.a0;
077                this.a1 = params.a1;
078                
079                this.Dx = new PixelPack(source, false); // container for X/Y-derivatives
080                this.Dy = new PixelPack(source, false);
081                
082                this.filterDx = new LinearFilter(Constants.kernelDx);
083                this.filterDy = new LinearFilter(Constants.kernelDy);
084                
085                this.gradientBlurFilter = new GaussianFilterSeparable(params.sigmaD);   
086                this.structureBlurFilter = new GaussianFilterSeparable(params.sigmaM);
087                
088                this.G = new PixelPack(M, N, 3, null);  // structure matrix as (u,v) with 3 elements    
089        }
090        
091        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
092        
093        @Override
094        protected void runPass(PixelPack source, PixelPack target) {
095                makeGradients();                                                        // Step 1
096                makeStructureMatrix();                                          // Step 2
097                float maxVelocity = updateImage();                      // Step 3
098                alpha = (float) params.dt / maxVelocity;        // Step 4: re-adjust alpha
099        }
100        
101        // ------------------------------------------------------------
102        
103        private void makeGradients() {
104                // x-gradients:
105                source.copyTo(Dx);
106                filterDx.applyTo(Dx);
107                gradientBlurFilter.applyTo(Dx);
108                // y-gradients:
109                source.copyTo(Dy);
110                filterDy.applyTo(Dy);
111                gradientBlurFilter.applyTo(Dy);
112        }
113        
114        private void makeStructureMatrix() {    // make M
115                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
116                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
117                                final float[] dx = Dx.getPix(u, v);
118                                final float[] dy = Dy.getPix(u, v);
119                                float g0 = 0; float g2 = 0; float g1 = 0;
120                                for (int k = 0; k < K; k++) {
121                                        final float fx = dx[k];
122                                        final float fy = dy[k];
123                                        g0 += fx * fx;
124                                        g1 += fy * fy;
125                                        g2 += fx * fy;
126                                }
127                                G.setPix(u, v, g0, g2, g1);
128                        }
129                }
130                structureBlurFilter.applyTo(G);
131        }
132
133        private float updateImage() {
134                float betaMax = Float.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;        // maximum velocity
135                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
136                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
137                                // calculate the local geometry matrix A(u,v), which has only 3 distinct elements
138                                float[] A = getGeometryMatrix(u, v);
139                                float[] p = source.getPix(u, v);
140                                for (int k = 0; k < K; k++) {
141                                        float[] H = getHessianMatrix(k, u, v); // local Hessian for channel k at pos u,v (3 elements)
142                                        float beta = A[0] * H[0] + 2 * A[1] * H[1] + A[2] * H[2]; // = trace (A*H)
143                                        betaMax = Math.max(betaMax, Math.abs(beta)); // find max absolute velocity for time-step adaptation
144                                        // update the image (result goes to target)
145                                        p[k] = p[k] + alpha * beta;     // we use alpha from the previous pass!
146                                }
147                                target.setPix(u, v, p);
148                        }
149                }
150                return betaMax;
151        }
152        
153        private float[] getGeometryMatrix(int u, int v) {
154                float[] Guv = G.getPix(u, v); // 3 elements of local geometry matrix (2x2)
155                
156                // calculate the 2 eigenvalues lambda1, lambda2 and the greater eigenvector e1
157                Eigensolver2x2 solver = new Eigensolver2x2(Guv[0], Guv[1], Guv[1], Guv[2]);
158                if (!solver.isReal()) {
159                        throw new RuntimeException("undefined eigenvalues in " + 
160                                        this.getClass().getSimpleName());
161                }
162                double lambda0 = solver.getRealEigenvalue(0);
163                double lambda1 = solver.getRealEigenvalue(1);
164                double[] evec0 = solver.getEigenvector(0).toArray();
165                Matrix.normalizeD(evec0);//  normalize(evec1);  
166                double arg = 1.0 + lambda0 + lambda1;   // 1 + lambda_1 + lambda_2
167                float c0 = (float) Math.pow(arg, -a0);
168                float c1 = (float) Math.pow(arg, -a1);
169                
170                // mount geometry matrix A:
171                float x0 = (float) evec0[0];
172                float y0 = (float) evec0[1];
173                float xx0 = x0 * x0;
174                float xy0 = x0 * y0;
175                float yy0 = y0 * y0;
176                
177                float A0 = c0 * yy0 + c1 * xx0;
178                float A1 = c0 * xx0 + c1 * yy0;
179                float A2 = (c1 - c0)* xy0;
180                return new float[] {A0, A2, A1};
181        }
182
183        
184        // Calculate the Hessian matrix Hk for channel k at position (u,v)
185        private float[] getHessianMatrix(int k, int u, int v) {
186                float[] Hk = new float[3];
187                PixelSlice Ik = source.getSlice(k);
188                float icc = Ik.getVal(u, v);
189                Hk[0] = Ik.getVal(u-1,v) + Ik.getVal(u+1,v) - 2 * icc;                                                          // = H_xx(u,v)
190                Hk[1] = 0.25f * (Ik.getVal(u-1,v-1) + Ik.getVal(u+1,v+1) - Ik.getVal(u-1,v+1) - Ik.getVal(u+1,v-1));    // = H_xy(u,v)
191                Hk[2] = Ik.getVal(u,v+1) + Ik.getVal(u,v-1) - 2 * icc;                                                          // = H_yy(u,v)
192                return Hk;
193        }
194        
195        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
196        
197//      private void normalize(double[] vec) {
198//              double norm = Matrix.normL2(vec);
199//              if (norm > 1E-6) {
200//                      for (int i = 0; i < vec.length; i++) {
201//                              vec[i] = vec[i] / norm;
202//                      }
203//              }
204//      }
205        
206        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
207        
208        @Override
209        protected final int passesRequired() {
210                return T;       // this filter needs T passes
211        }
212        
213        @Override
214        // cleanup temporary data (probably unnecessary)
215        protected void closeFilter() {
216                this.Dx = null;
217                this.Dy = null;
218                this.G = null;
219        }
220
221}
222
